unnormalised: ## Tap That: Diving Deep into the World of Music Streaming
normalised: ## Tap That: Diving Deep into the World of Music Streaming

unnormalised: Hey everyone! Remember those days of lugging around a Walkman and carefully curating mixtapes? Ah, nostalgia! But let’s be honest, music streaming has totally revolutionized how we consume tunes, right?
normalised: Hey everyone! Remember those days of lugging around a Walkman and carefully curating mixtapes? Ah, nostalgia! But let’s be honest, music streaming has totally revolutionized how we consume tunes, right?

unnormalised: Gone are the days of spending hours burning CDs or, even worse, waiting for a track to download (dial-up, anyone?). Now, we have a universe of music at our fingertips, all thanks to platforms like Spotify, Apple Music, Gaana, and JioSaavn. I mean, seriously, I can be listening to A.R. Rahman one minute and then switch to the latest Badshah banger the next. It's incredible!
normalised: Gone are the days of spending hours burning C D s or, even worse, waiting for a track to download (dial-up, anyone?). Now, we have a universe of music at our fingertips, all thanks to platforms like Spotify, Apple Music, Gaana, and JioSaavn. I mean, seriously, I can be listening to A. R. Rahman one minute and then switch to the latest Badshah banger the next. It's incredible!

unnormalised: The convenience is just unmatched. Need something to groove to on your daily commute from Borivali to Churchgate? Sorted. Want to soundtrack your chai break at IIT Bombay with some mellow instrumentals? Done.
normalised: The convenience is just unmatched. Need something to groove to on your daily commute from Borivali to Churchgate? Sorted. Want to soundtrack your chai break at I I T Bombay with some mellow instrumentals? Done.

unnormalised: But it's not just about convenience. These platforms offer personalized playlists, discover new artists based on your listening habits, and even let you share your favorite tracks with friends. Remember how obsessed everyone was with "Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge"? Well, imagine if Raj and Simran could share their ultimate love song playlist instantly!
normalised: But it's not just about convenience. These platforms offer personalized playlists, discover new artists based on your listening habits, and even let you share your favorite tracks with friends. Remember how obsessed everyone was with "Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge"? Well, imagine if Raj and Simran could share their ultimate love song playlist instantly!

unnormalised: Of course, there are some drawbacks. The debate about artist compensation is still ongoing. Streaming services pay artists a fraction of a rupee per stream, and many argue that it’s not enough, especially for independent musicians.
normalised: Of course, there are some drawbacks. The debate about artist compensation is still ongoing. Streaming services pay artists a fraction of a rupee per stream, and many argue that it’s not enough, especially for independent musicians.

unnormalised: And then there’s the constant battle for our attention. So many options, so little time! It can be overwhelming trying to navigate the sheer volume of music available. But hey, that's a pretty good problem to have, isn’t it?
normalised: And then there’s the constant battle for our attention. So many options, so little time! It can be overwhelming trying to navigate the sheer volume of music available. But hey, that's a pretty good problem to have, isn’t it?

unnormalised: Ultimately, music streaming is here to stay. It's changed the game, democratized access to music, and made it easier than ever to discover new sounds. Just remember to support your favorite artists, whether it's by buying their merchandise or simply sharing their music with others. Happy listening!
normalised: Ultimately, music streaming is here to stay. It's changed the game, democratized access to music, and made it easier than ever to discover new sounds. Just remember to support your favorite artists, whether it's by buying their merchandise or simply sharing their music with others. Happy listening!
